segments.text: I can't believe how calm the woman is while everything is going wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the sink, and she doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, taking those cookies right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like yelling at them to stop, but they're so focused on their mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach that jar, he must really want those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised he hasn't fallen yet, but he seems determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her treat, she seems so patient.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they know how much trouble they'll be in if they get caught, but they don't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is just getting worse and worse, but they're not paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone does something soon before it's too late, but I doubt they will.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just making me anxious, but it's almost funny how chaotic it is.
segments.speaker: PAR
